tests.sic.sST.nbin

Class sSTCnbinTermPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.sic.sST.nbin.sSTCnbin
      • tests.sic.sST.nbin.sSTCnbinTermPlotter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FunctionIntf

    public class sSTCnbinTermPlotter
extends sSTCnbin
    The class plots the partial sums sum1 and sum2 as more terms are added while computing the sSTCnbin function; alternatively, it will plot the value of the cost function as more terms are added in both sums.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2021

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setPlotValues

        public void setPlotValues(boolean doVals)
        set the flag to indicate that we want a plot of the actual cost values vs the number of terms added in the two sums, not the partial sums sum1 and sum2 themselves.
        Parameters:
        doVals - boolean

      • eval

        public double eval(java.lang.Object x,
                   java.util.HashMap params)
        the main method call clears out any previous sum-term values, and calls its parent's method.
        Specified by:

      • sum1

        protected double sum1(int r,
                      int R,
                      double T,
                      double t,
                      double l,
                      double m,
                      double IC,
                      double phat,
                      double eps)
        not part of the public API. Over-rides the definition in class sSTCnbin.
        Overrides:
        sum1 in class sSTCnbin
        Parameters:
        r - int the re-order point
        R - int the order-up-to point
        T - double the review period length
        t - double the lead-time
        l - double the mean demand-rate of the Negative Binomial distribution
        m - double the mean lead-time demand
        IC - double the holding cost rate
        phat - double the back-orders cost rate
        eps - double the threshold below which when the ratio of the last _numTerms terms sum up to divided by the total number of terms added up so far falls, the computation of the infinite series stops
        Returns:
        double

      • sum2

        protected double sum2(int r,
                      int R,
                      double T,
                      double l,
                      double eps)
        not part of the public API. Used to be private, but it needs to be over-ridden here.
        Overrides:
        sum2 in class sSTCnbin
        Parameters:
        r - int the reorder point
        R - int the order-up-to point
        T - double the review period length
        l - double the demand rate
        eps - the same threshold as specified in sum1(), but for this method.
        Returns:
        double
